Localization.Name: Ascension Astro
Localization.Description: Ascension Astro started off as a boutique specialty company; selling high-end, low IR thrusters to wealthy clients who wanted to fly their luxury ships while avoiding the eyes of greedy pirates. As good as their thrusters were at being low-sig, the effect was often ruined when the engines or shielding made by other manufacturers would be screaming the ship’s presence. Slowly, Ascension began expanding their line to include a whole suite of components that, when working in conjunction, would provide an extremely low profile and a safer journey.

English.Name: Ascension Astro
English.Description: Ascension Astro started off as a boutique specialty company; selling high-end, low IR thrusters to wealthy clients who wanted to fly their luxury ships while avoiding the eyes of greedy pirates. As good as their thrusters were at being low-sig, the effect was often ruined when the engines or shielding made by other manufacturers would be screaming the ship’s presence. Slowly, Ascension began expanding their line to include a whole suite of components that, when working in conjunction, would provide an extremely low profile and a safer journey.

Localization.Name: Veil
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Ascension Astro
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Stealth

An advanced cooling system significantly reduces the heat produced by the Veil stealth shield generator. No other component in its class even comes close to rivaling its heat suppression technology.
